addressed._comment: Usernames with '@' symbol, tweets addressed to these usernames in conjunction with keywords and/or hashtags will be included

keywords._comment: Case insensitive values for exact match, append 'contains:' for substring match

hashtags._comment: Case insensitive values for hashtag exact match, without the '#' symbol

_comment.boundingBoxes: array of [west_long, south_lat, east_long, north_lat] - NOTE: Width and height of the bounding box must be less than 25mi
